tooltip.fillDataToSignIn: Fill out the inputs to sign in

noItems.teacher: There are no subjects that you are lecturing.
noItems.student: You are not assigned to any subjects yet.

tooltip.average: Automatically calculated, average grade of all assignment grades assessed. Based on this and other factors, teacher chooses the final grade.
tooltip.proposed: Manually selected by the teacher, proposed grade for this subject. It was selected based on the average assignment grade visible above as well as activity and behaviour grades.
tooltip.final: Manually selected by the teacher, final grade for this subject. This grade is definitive and cannot be modified.

typeChangedTo.task: Type was adjusted to "Task" due to the duration (shorter than 12 hours)
typeChangedTo.homework: Type was adjusted to "Homework" due to the duration (12 hours or longer)

form.alreadyStarted: Editing start time is disabled, because the task has already started or finished.

submissions.noItems: There are no submitted solutions yet.
submissions.receivedGrade: This submission has been evaluated to
submissions.gradeNotSubmittedWith: Grade everyone who hasn't submitted with {{ grade }}

task.taskMessagePlaceholder: Type your answer or leave additional comment

tooltip.cannotSubmitPastDeadline: Deadline has passed, you can no longer submit a solution.

confirm.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this task? This operation cannot be undone.
confirm.finishNwMessage: Are you sure you want to finish this task right now? This operation cannot be undone.
confirm.bulkEvaluateMessage: Are you sure you want to assign grade 1 to every student, who did not send a submission? This operation cannot be undone.

confirm.publishNowMessage: Are you sure you want to publish this notice? This operation cannot be undone.
confirm.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this notice? This operation cannot be undone.

toast.proposedSuccess: Successfully assigned the proposed final grade

message.assignment:
You are modifying grade of <0>{{ studentName }}
received for task <0>{{ taskName }} (created at {{ date }}).
message.behaviour:
You are modifying grade of <0>{{ studentName }}
received for <0>behaviour (created at {{ date }}).
message.activity:
You are modifying grade of <0>{{ studentName }}
received for <0>activity (created at {{ date }}).

helperText.setSubjectToSetStudent: To select student, first select subject
helperText.setSubjectToSetTask: To select task, first select subject
helperText.setSubjectToSetName: To set grade name, first select subject
helperText.nonAssignmentGrade: Task is needed only when grade is an assignment grade
helperText.assignmentGrade: Grade name is needed only when grade is assigned for behaviour or activity

toast.assumedLowestValue:
Automatically selected grade F, because no submission was delivered in time.
It is only a guess though.

message.propose:
Select a grade to propose as the <0>final grade for student <0>{{ studentName }}.
This grade can be modified later, until it is confirmed as the final grade.

Current <0>average grade is <0>{{ averageGrade }}.
message.change:
Select a grade to propose as the <0>final grade for student <0>{{ studentName }}.
This grade can be modified until it is confirmed as the final grade.

Current <0>average grade is <0>{{ averageGrade }}.
message.confirm:
Current <0>proposed final grade for student <0>{{ studentName }} is <0>{{ proposedGrade }}.
If this grade is selected as the final one, <0>it cannot be later modified.

checkbox.propose: I understand and I want to assign the proposed final grade
checkbox.change: I understand and I want to change the proposed final grade
checkbox.confirm: I understand and I want to confirm the final grade

dialog.largeDifference: Currently selected grade is <0>{{ value }}</0>, which is significantly different than the <0>average grade</0>. Are you sure this grade is appropriate?
dialog.selectValue: To propose a grade, first choose appropriate one.

confirm.proposeMessage:
You are about to propose the final grade <0>{{ value }} for student <0>{{ studentName }}. Please double check everything is set correctly:

- <0>student (definitely this one?)
- <0>grade (considering average value and activity & behaviour grades)
- <0>subject (is this the correct one?)
confirm.confirmMessage:
You are about to confirm the <0>final grade <0>{{ value }} for student <0>{{ studentName }}. Please double check everything is set correctly:

- <0>student (definitely this one?)
- <0>grade (considering average value and activity & behaviour grades)
- <0>subject (is this the correct one?)

tooltip.editDisabled: This item is no longer editable
tooltip.alreadyPublished: Item is already published, cannot edit its publishing time.
tooltip.share: Copy the link to this item

tooltip.missingData: Not all required data is provided
tooltip.formUntouched: Form data has not been modified

subjectCategories.title: Subject categories management

tooltip.nameCannotBeEmpty: You need to define a category name in order to create it
tooltip.nothingToSave: No change to the name was made

confirm.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete <0>{{name}}</0> category? This operation cannot be undone.

subjectCategories.noItems: There are no subject categories yet.

toast.updateError: There was an error when updating class
There was an error when updating subject

confirm.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete user "{{ name }}"? This operation cannot be undone.

confirm.activateMessage: Are you sure you want to activate user "{{name}}"?
confirm.deactivateMessage: Are you sure you want to deactivate user "{{name}}"?

error.FILE_TOO_BIG: The file is too large. Max size allowed is {{ maxSize }}.
error.FIRST_NAME_REQUIRED: Cannot create a user without first name.
error.EMAIL_TAKEN: This email is already in use.
error.SUBJECT_NAME_TAKEN: This category subject name is already in use.
error.Class_NAME_TAKEN: This class name is already taken.
error.TASK_DURATION_TOO_SHORT: Task duration is too short. At least {{ min }} min is required.
error.TASK_DURATION_TOO_LONG: Task duration is too long. Regular task duration cannot be greater than {{ max }} hours.
error.HOMEWORK_DURATION_TOO_LONG: Homework duration is too long. It should not be greater than 12 months.
